title: The Ainsley Court Robbery
description: During the cool summer of 1924 as England recovers from the horrors of the First World War, the story follows the life and loves of the family of Lord Milton, Earl of Dowland.Robert Bradshaw, a former pilot, is restless and hoping for a change. Through a round of social parties, he and his wife Lady Eloise and their friends, move from house to house engaged in a range of upper-class pursuits.A spate of jewel robberies is the hot topic of conversation among the friends and throughout the summer, relationships bubble and stir, finally reaching boiling point.Edward, Robert’s younger brother, always friendlier with the servants, learns some startling information about Eloise’s first husband. As the robberies come closer to home, Edward takes more interest.Robert becomes a partner in his father-in-law’s instrument making business and rummaging into the accounts, he finds things aren’t quite as they should be.
author: Jenni Thornley
